A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I felt this movie had a lot of great 'stuff' in it\, all of which portrayed sort of poorly by Johnson. I was disappointed to see someone other than JJ Abrams do this movie because the Force Awakens hit so many of the boxes that made for a great adventure movie as well as a stand alone Star Wars movie. \nThere was little chemistry between the characters and most of the scenes were a tense build up to a very quick and unfulfilling climax.  \nThe Last Jedi felt sort of like a cat walking on it's hind legs. Awkward.
